Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 8.2.3

==Policy Statement==

Enforce password complexity requirements.

==Policy Purpose==

Using long passwords ensures that the passwords are hard to crack. Using both letters and numbers in passwords makes it harder for an attacker to crack the passwords.

==Related Guidance==

* [[22758ac9-6419-4a3a-8bdc-91e0da06a520|Enforce Strong Password Requirements]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[617b6f1f-017c-4cab-91ec-854fee4be42e|Strong Password Requirements Are Enforced]]
